member.summary: Name of conversion method of class returned from "ConverterImplementation" property.

member.name: M:EmitMapper.IMappingConfigurator.GetMappingOperations(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Get list of mapping operations. Each mapping mapping defines one copieng operation from source to destination. For this operation can be additionally defined the following custom operations: - Custom getter which extracts values from source - Custom values converter which converts extracted from source value - Custom setter which writes value to destination

member.summary: Define shallow map mode for the specified type. In that case all members of this type will be copied by reference if it is possible
member.typeparam: Type for which shallow map mode is defining

member.name: M:EmitMapper.MappingConfiguration.DefaultMapConfig.ShallowMap(System.Type)
member.summary: Define shallow map mode for the specified type. In that case all members of this type will be copied by reference if it is possible
member.param: Type for which shallow map mode is defining

member.name: M:EmitMapper.MappingConfiguration.DefaultMapConfig.ShallowMap
member.summary: Define default shallow map mode. In that case all members will be copied by reference (if it is possible) by default.

member.name: M:EmitMapper.MappingConfiguration.DefaultMapConfig.DeepMap``1
member.summary: Define deep map mode for the specified type. In that case all members of this type will be copied by value (new instances will be created)
member.typeparam: Type for which deep map mode is defining

member.name: M:EmitMapper.MappingConfiguration.DefaultMapConfig.DeepMap(System.Type)
member.summary: Define deep map mode for the specified type. In that case all members of this type will be copied by value (new instances will be created)
member.param: Type for which deep map mode is defining

member.name: M:EmitMapper.MappingConfiguration.DefaultMapConfig.DeepMap
member.summary: Define default deep map mode. In that case all members will be copied by value (new instances will be created) by default

member.name: M:EmitMapper.MappingConfiguration.DefaultMapConfig.MatchMembers(System.Func{System.String,System.String,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Define a function to test two members if they have identical names.
member.param: Function to test two members if they have identical names. For example if you want to match members ignoring case you can define the following function: (m1, m2) => m1.ToUpper() == m2.ToUpper()
